title: TPACK-Based Online Teacher Training: Strengthening Social Studies Technology Integration Competencies via SQD Strategy

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: A competency-development program for designing and implementing practical, digitally enhanced social studies education via online platforms.

learning_goals: Learners can write a digital social studies instructional design document combining TPACK components (technology, content, pedagogy) with over 80% completeness.
Learners can develop three or more PBL class models applying the SQD strategy (role model analysis, reflective practice, collaborative feedback, etc.).
Learners can achieve over 70% learner engagement after implementing social studies project classes using digital tools (Quizlet, Padlet, Google Earth, etc.).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
